attributes.action: HAVE A HEART FOR HEART MONITORING - LOOK AT FETAL IN UTERO EQUIPMENT - PLEASE SUPPLY EVERY A & E & AMBULANCE WITH A SONICAID OR AT LEAST A FETAL PINARD'S STETHOSCOPE. PLEASE UPDATE PARAMEDIC SKILLS TO INCLUDE HOW TO CARE FOR PREGNANT WOMEN.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AT PRESENT THERE IS NO SONICAID IN WHISTON OF WARRINGTON A & E - PATIENTS COMPLAIN THAT THEY AREN'T BEING CARED FOR - PROBABLY BECAUSE STAFF ARE 

A) LOOKING FOR EQUIPMENT
B) TRYING TO GET TIMESHEETS SIGNED

PLEASE CONDUCT AN AUDIT AND GIVE GUIDANCE ON ALL THESE ASPECTS OF EMPLOYMENT & SERVICE PROVISION.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
